text:
Chelsea press conference live: Antonio Conte reveals latest team news ahead of Swansea clash Chelsea are currently eight points clear at the top of the table Antonio Conte's men face relegation battlers Swansea on Saturday Latest team news and updates as we get them from Cobham By LEE ASTLEY Help Hub
